snippet: Kwame R. Brown, who has been charged with bank fraud and campaign finance violations, was the most recent target in investigations that have swept the nation’s capital.
abstract: Prosecutors in Washington DC charge City Council Chairman Kwame R Brown with bank fraud and campaign finance violations, expanding a growing circle of federal cases that have thrown the city's government into turmoil; Brown, the most prominent figure yet to be charged, promptly resigns.
lead_paragraph: Kwame R. Brown, who has been charged with bank fraud and campaign finance violations, was the most recent target in investigations that have swept the nation’s capital.

headline.seo: D.C. Councilor Resigns After Bank Fraud Charge
